com.microsoft.azure.iothub.auth

Class IotHubSasToken

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.azure.iothub.auth.IotHubSasToken

  • public final class IotHubSasToken
extends Object
    Grants device access to an IoT Hub for the specified amount of time.

    • Field Summary

    • Field Detail

      • TOKEN_FORMAT

        public static final String TOKEN_FORMAT
        The SAS token format. The parameters to be interpolated are, in order: the signature, the expiry time, the key name (device ID), and the resource URI.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • signature

        protected final String signature
        Components of the SAS token.

      • expiryTime

        protected final long expiryTime
        The time, as a UNIX timestamp, before which the token is valid.

      • keyName

        protected final String keyName

      • resourceUri

        protected final String resourceUri
        The URI for a connection from a device to an IoT Hub. Does not include a protocol.

      • appendSknValue

        public boolean appendSknValue

    • Constructor Detail

      • IotHubSasToken

        public IotHubSasToken(String resourceUri,
              String deviceId,
              String deviceKey,
              long expiryTime)
        Constructor. Generates a SAS token that grants access to an IoT Hub for the specified amount of time.
        Parameters:
        resourceUri - the resource URI.
        deviceId - the device ID.
        deviceKey - the device key.
        expiryTime - the time, as a UNIX timestamp, after which the token will become invalid.

        protected IotHubSasToken()
